Package agh.alleviation.presentation

Class ViewControllerManager

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.presentation.ViewControllerManager
@Component
public class ViewControllerManager
extends java.lang.Object
ViewControllerManager is responsible for setting up the controllers of the application. It heavily relies on FxWeaver in order to maintain cooperation between JavaFX and Spring Boot. It sets up modal views for adding user and hall.
Author:
Kamil Krzempek
See Also:
ScreenSwitcher
